tiny_json_conv 1.0.1


    

      

        

    
Meta conv for Tiny Json

    
Converters for meta_conv + tiny_json


  

        

          
            
            

              Versions
              
             
               1.0.0
              , 
             
               1.0.1
             
           , 
             
               1.1.0
              , 
             
               1.2.0
              , 
             
               1.3.0
              , 
             
               1.4.0
              , 
             
               1.4.1
              
            

      
            
            
            
            
            
            

              Maintainer
              jun.furuse@gmail.com
            

      
            
            
            

              Dependencies
               meta_conv (= 0.10.0) &  ocamlfind &  omake &  tiny_json
            

      
            
            
            

              OCaml
              >= 4.0.1
            

      
            
            
            

              Published
              Aug 31, 2014
            

      
            
        

        Source  [http] 
        
          https://bitbucket.org/camlspotter/tiny_json_conv/get/1.0.1.tar.gz

           4bb6bd3c10520d917afe911e56789460 
        		
        

      
             
            
            

              Edit
              
        https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/tree/master/packages/tiny_json_conv/tiny_json_conv.1.0.1/opam
      
            

      
          
        

      

      

        

          
            
             
Necessary for

           
 facebook-sdk (>= 0.3.1)
 sociaml-tumblr-api
